description: A single coal mine in southern Poland accounted for 38% of all new infections on Sunday.
title: Coronavirus: Hundreds of Polish infections linked to mine
title_page: Coronavirus: Hundreds of Polish infections linked to mine - BBC News
maintext: In Poland, 1,157 people have died from Covid-19 and 26,561 have been infected but the stubborn persistence of cases in Upper Silesia mean the country has not passed its peak.
